Class Shell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shell

  • public class Shell
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the Epam shell exercise
    Author:
    Dawid Holko

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • promptChange

        public static void promptChange(Prompt prompt,
                                java.lang.String parameter,
                                Directory directory)
        This function is used to change prompt in shell by using 'prompt' command
        Parameters:
        prompt - Prompt object which defines the prompt sign in shell
        parameter - The part after prompt command of entered string
        directory - Current working directory, it is used to show current directory path in prompt

      • showDirectoryContent

        public static void showDirectoryContent(java.io.File directory)
        This function is used to handle 'dir' command in shell. It shows content of current working directory
        Parameters:
        directory - Directory which content should be displayed

      • showDirectoryTree

        public static void showDirectoryTree(java.io.File directory,
                                     int indent)
        This function is used to handle 'tree' command in shell. It shows tree structure of current working directory and its subdirectories
        Parameters:
        directory - Directory which content should be displayed
        indent - Variable describing in which depth we are in directories tree

      • getIndentString

        public static void getIndentString(int indent)
        This function is used to show '-' characters as indentation of subdirectories
        Parameters:
        indent - Variable describing in which depth we are in directories tree. In this case - it describes how many '-' characters should be printed

      • changeDirectory

        public static void changeDirectory(Prompt prompt,
                                   Directory directory,
                                   java.lang.String parameter)
        This function is used to change current working directory
        Parameters:
        prompt - Prompt object which defines the prompt sign in shell
        parameter - The part after cd command of entered string
        directory - Current working directory
